snippet.title: Anno 2205 Tundra Trailer [NA]
snippet.description:
Expand your corporation on the Vanha Plains within the new Tundra sector. Roam the marshes and cross the fjords with your new futuristic aircraft. Establish new production chains to support Tundra’s population of protectors and scientists. Reclaim dry land from the marshes and transform it into lively and productive colonies, solving the mystery of the forgotten Eco sanctuaries. Complete the new sector quest to unlock new modules which can boost your production in every sector.
  
 Anno 2205™ Tundra is the first of two new sectors to be released as part of the game’s Season Pass, available separately or included in the Gold Edition.
 
 Learn more at anno-game.ubi.com.
 
 © 2016 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Anno 2205, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. Anno, Blue Byte, and the Blue Byte logo are trademarks of Ubisoft GmbH in the US and/or other countries.
